summary:
She is located in Falkreath at the Dead Mans Drink. She is a Level 45 or Auto-Level, Essential or Non-Essential Combat Assassin. You have three different choices of hairstyle with her too. 
I adjusted her weights to be compatible with all body mods, ADEC, UNP-B and CBBE with BBP.
descriptionHtml:
[b][center][size=5]Sura The Lioness of Persia -Combat Assassin-[/size][/center][/b]

[b]About; The name Sura, was taken from one of the greatest heroines in Persian History. I based my characters facial features and body proportions on 23 year old auto show and car magazine model Bahara Golestani. Bahara is Persian and I did my best to recreate her skin tone, body and face within the limits of this game. I studied well over 100 pictures of her, I feel like I know her intimately now.[/b]

[b][size= 2][color= ghostwhite][font= timesnewroman]
Required Files: Latest version of ApachiiSkyhair 
Race: Breton
Voice: Female Young Eager
Hair: Black
Eyes: Brown
Weight: 50% at the scale. If you use ADEC, UNPB or CBBE bodies with BBP she should be fine.
Height: 5\'5\" to 5\'8\" 
Location: Falkreath, Deadmans Drink
Perks and Spells: Her perks are geared for towards the assassin type player. Spells are Healing and Stoneflesh.
Inventory: She is equipped with two Elven daggers. She is nude without armor so you can outfit her with whatever you wish.
Properties: She is available non-essential or essential and is marriageable.[/b][/size][/font][/color]

[b]For her to appear as she does in my images use the following mods;
Bella\'s Better Faces with Makeup version 1:
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=2812
Caliente\'s CBBEv3 Curvy with Navetseas CBBEv3 body texture: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=6554
Caliente\'s Darker Neater Eyebrows: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2666
Her eyes are brown Natural Eyes by nevenbridge: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=3589
Pretty Lips by Danariel: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=1167

Credit to \"Bob\'s Armory\" for the Falcata swords! http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=12060
and KURESE - R18Pn Set - Inner Wear Set for UNP and CBBEV3 
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=15529

Thanks for trying her out and if you like her or my work endorsements are welcome and much appreciated! 
 
FB[/b]
author: FalmerBane
